text: “Nde rɨmgi mbatɨgi gumgi, nde tuavar harigi gumgi khɨvɨr za mbui, nde warir rɨvɨri. Nde kha khesharigi buni nzuai, ‘Guma buna thuen Fhe Bakɨme Phena suaŋgirga.’ Nde khaŋ nzuai, mba kameŋ, ne fhura ki kameŋ ma. Nde maaŋ muuŋgip guma the khaŋ suanga, ‘Gor Fhe Bakɨme Phena ki,’ mba guma maaŋ suaŋgirga, ana guigira mba suaŋgi kameŋ zɨn ŋgɨp mba bigen muuŋgiri.
